commentTag.essential:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for essential feedback
**UI Location**: Comment tag in representation view
**When Users See This**: When a feedback comment is marked as 'essential'
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Essential"
commentTag.recommended:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for recommended feedback
**UI Location**: Comment tag in representation view
**When Users See This**: When a feedback comment is marked as 'actionable' (recommended)
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Recommended"
representationIterationView.solutionNumb:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the solution number for an iteration.
**UI Location**: Representation iteration header.
**When Users See This**: When viewing a specific solution iteration.
**Technical Context**: `solutionNumber` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Solution #{solutionNumber}"
representationIterationView.occurrences:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the number of occurrences of a solution, pluralized.
**UI Location**: Representation iteration header, below the solution number.
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution iteration that has occurred multiple times.
**Technical Context**: `count` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "{count} occurrences"
representationIterationView.occurrence:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the number of occurrences of a solution, singular.
**UI Location**: Representation iteration header, below the solution number.
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution iteration that has occurred once.
**Technical Context**: `count` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "{count} occurrence"
representationIterationView.lastOccurred:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays when the solution last occurred.
**UI Location**: Representation iteration header, below the solution number.
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution iteration.
**Technical Context**: `lastOccurred` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Last occurred {lastOccurred}"
representationInfo.feedbackOnSolution:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text indicating the purpose of the current view.
**UI Location**: Left pane of the representation view, above the exercise and track details.
**When Users See This**: When a mentor is viewing a solution set to provide feedback.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Youâ€™re giving feedback on a solution set for"
leftPane.exerciseInTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the name of the exercise and the track it belongs to.
**UI Location**: Left pane of the representation view, below the feedback purpose text.
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution set for a specific exercise within a track.
**Technical Context**: `exerciseTitle` and `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "{exerciseTitle} in {trackTitle}"
